title: Hilary Duff sports mustard coat with a plaid skirt on first day of filming Lizzie McGuire movie
text:
She's returning to the big screen to play a character that catapulted her into the spotlight at a young age.

And Hilary Duff looked positively delighted on the first day of filming the new Lizzie McGuire movie in New York City on Tuesday afternoon.

The 32-year-old actress was all-smiles while dressed in a gorgeous mustard coat to film scenes in Washington Square Park.

Hey now! Hilary Duff looked positively delighted on the first day of filming the new Lizzie McGuire movie in New York City on Tuesday afternoon

Hilary looked impossibly chic wearing a yellow-and-black plaid blazer paired with a matching mini skirt.

A host of gold necklaces were prominently displayed on top of a black crewneck top which was tucked into her skirt.

Adding even more emphasis on the perfect color for the fall season, Duff stayed warm in a long mustard peacoat which dipped down below her knees.

Back in action: She posted on Instagram with a slew of emojis to follow: 'Happy first LIZZIE day!!!!! NYC.....cue the rain'

The So Yesterday songstress pounded the pavement in a pair of black leather booties and carried an off-white leather purse across her shoulder.

She seemed to have no problems staying hydrated for the day as she carried a massive cup from Starbucks in one hand and a water bottle in the other.

And the rainy weather wasn't much of a problem as Hilary walked back and forth on set with the help of a trusty umbrella handler.
